title: New class wizard doesn't get context right for nested classes
description: When using the new class wizard for nested classes, the context is not set correctly.
OB: When I have a .java file open in the editor and click the new class button, the 'Enclosing Type' field in the new class wizard is blank.
EB: The 'Enclosing Type' field in the new class wizard should default to the current type in the editor.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open a .java file in the editor. 
2. Click on the new class button. 
3. Check the 'Enclosing Type' field in the new class wizard; it should be blank, indicating that the current type in the editor is not correctly set as the default value.
